title: Goa Gajah & Ubud Sights (Half-day)
overview: A cultural half-day trip to the ancient Elephant Cave and nearby Ubud highlights.

stops.description: Explore the 9th-century cave, bathing pools, and stone carvings.
Visit the royal palace in Ubud center.

title: Temples & Caves of Ubud (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Goa Gajah, sacred temples, and the cultural heart of Ubud.

stops.description: Tour the ancient cave and temple grounds.
Visit the temple complex with rock-cut shrines.
See the royal palace and gardens.
Shop for Balinese crafts and souvenirs.
